ISSUE.TITLE: `podman kube generate` shall include `spec.automountServiceAccountToken: false`
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Podman containers are supposed to work equally good, when moved to Kubernetes. Podman does not use Kubertenesâ€™ Service Account. Therefore once a pod is moved from Podman to Kuberenes it will not need its service account. To disable implicitly mounting the service account in the pod, which does eat resources, add ```yaml spec: automountServiceAccountToken: false ``` to the output of `podman kube generate`.
